the first term is 1, find the common difference.

21. Find the nth term of the sequence  
3,6,10,15,21,….. 
A. n(n - 1/2) B. n(n + 1/2) 
C. (n + 1)(n + 2)/2  D. n(2n + 1) 
 
22. A binary operation * is defined on the set of all positive 
integers by a*b = ab for all positive integers a,b. which of 
the following properties does NOT hold? 
A. Closure B. Associativity. 
C. Identity. D. Inverse. 
 
23.  
 
In the diagram above, O is the centre of the circle. If 
SOQ is a diameter and <PRS is 38 0, what is the value 
of <PSQ? 
A. 1480 B. 1040 
C. 800 D. 520 
 
28. If three angles of a quadrilateral are (3y – x - z)0, 3x0, 
(2z – 2y - x) 0, find the fourth angle in terms of x, y, and 
z. 
A. (360 – x – y - z)0   B. (360 + x + y - z)0 
C. (180 – x + y + z)0  D. (180 + x + y + z)0 
 
29. An open rectangular box is made of wood 2cm thick. If 
the internal dimensions of the box are 50cm long, 36cm 
wide and 20cm deep, the volume of wood in the box is 
A. 11520cm3 B. 36000cm3 
C. 38200cm3 D. 47520cm3 
 
30. Calculate the perimeter in cm, of a sector of a circle of 
radius 8cm and angle 450
